title: Epitaph for Aurelios Restoutos and Zosime
support: Marble plaque damaged on the left corners and set in plaster in modern times.

handNote.lettering: Irregular letters: lunate Ε and Σ; cursive Μ and Ω; Α and Λ with extended serifs.

date._: 4th century CE or first half of 5th century CE

provenanceFound._: Found in 1740 “in via, quae ad S. Agata suburbium ducit” (Amico) and stored in Museo S. Nicolò Arena “ex dono Ignatii Rizzari”.

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Kaibel in Museo dei Benedettini, now in Magazzino del Cortile, collezione dei Benedettini (formerly sala VI, 111).

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
